mapper.select: select sys_transportion_id from sys_transportion where sys_transportion_id like CONCAT(#{province_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') order by sys_transportion_id desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into sys_transportion (sys_transportion_id, sys_user_account_id, transportion_name, station_manager, contact_phone, admin_username, email, area_id, province_id, city_id, address, longitude, latitude, expiry_date, salesmen_id, salesmen_name, operations_id, operations_name, indu_com_number, tax_number, indu_com_certif, tax_certif, lng_certif, dcp_certif, platform_type, status, created_time, updated_time, pay_code, deposit ) values (#{sys_transportion_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sys_user_account_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transportion_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{station_manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact_phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admin_username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expiry_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{salesmen_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesmen_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operations_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operations_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indu_com_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tax_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indu_com_certif,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tax_certif,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lng_certif,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dcp_certif,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platform_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updated_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pay_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
